## AppCommandRunner

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/app/commands/AppCommandRunner.ts" sourceLine="25" packageName="commandkit" />

Handles the execution of application commands for CommandKit.
Manages middleware execution, environment setup, and command invocation.

```ts title="Signature"
class AppCommandRunner {
    constructor(handler: AppCommandHandler)
    runCommand(prepared: PreparedAppCommandExecution, source: Interaction | Message) => ;
    getExecutionMode(source: Interaction | Message) => CommandExecutionMode;
}
```

### runCommand

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(prepared: <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/prepared-app-command-execution#preparedappcommandexecution'>PreparedAppCommandExecution</a>, source: Interaction | Message) => `}   />

Executes a prepared command with middleware support and environment setup.
Handles the complete command lifecycle including before/after middleware execution.
### getExecutionMode

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(source: Interaction | Message) => <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/command-execution-mode#commandexecutionmode'>CommandExecutionMode</a>`}   />
